oneTimeLink: One time link to share passwords, keys, and other sensitive data.
shareLink: Done! Just share the link below 🎉
thisLinkWillBeDestroyed: This link will only be valid for <1>ttl</1>. Once this link is opened or it expires, your secret data will be destroyed from the system.
clickToOpen: Click "Open Secret" to view. Be sure to save it somewhere safe - it can only be viewed once!
